H0.text: England won the 1966 World Cup beating Germany 4-2. Hurst scored 3 of England's goals who scored the other. Bobby Charlton

H1.text: England won the 1966 World Cup beating Germany 4-2. Hurst scored 3 of England's goals who scored the other. Bobby Moore

H2.text: England won the 1966 World Cup beating Germany 4-2. Hurst scored 3 of England's goals who scored the other. Geoff Hurst

H3.text: England won the 1966 World Cup beating Germany 4-2. Hurst scored 3 of England's goals who scored the other. Martin Peters

A4.text: He was the only man to score a hat-trick in a World Cup final until Kylian Mbapp√© did so in 2022.

A5.text: England took the lead with a 78th minute goal from Martin Peters (who was the only player to be booked during the match).

A6.text: Martin Stanford Peters scored the second of England's four goals in the final against West Germany.
